name: jira-orchestrator
description: Comprehensive Jira orchestration plugin with 77 agents, 45 commands, 13 skills, and automated hook-based workflows. Features official Atlassian MCP SSE OAuth, Harness platform integration, Confluence documentation, multi-agent collaboration patterns, integrated MCP servers for documentation/reasoning/knowledge, and structured reasoning frameworks (Chain-of-Thought, Tree-of-Thought, Hypothesis Debugging, Root Cause Analysis) with mandatory documentation lookup.
author: Markus Ahling <markus@lobbi.io>
